name: Windows Defender Threat Detection Disabled - Service
description: Detects the "Windows Defender Threat Protection" service has been disabled
false_positives: Auto updates of Windows Defender causes restarts
query: (winlog.channel:System AND event.code:7036 AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND param1:(/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]\ [Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]/ OR /[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\ [Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr]/) AND param2:/[Ss][Tt][Oo][Pp][Pp][Ee][Dd]/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND event.code:7036 AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND param1:(Windows\ Defender\ Antivirus\ Service OR Service\ antivirus\ Microsoft\ Defender) AND param2:stopped)`
